for i in range(int(input())):
    x = list(map(int, input().split()))
    h = 0
    c = x[0]
    b = x[1]
    n = x[2]
    m = x[3]
    s = c + b
    l = n + m
    s = s % 2
    l = l % 2
    if c == n and b == m:
        print(h)
    elif s == l:
        print('2')
    else:
        print('1')

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    (a, b, x, y) = map(int, input().split())
    p = a + b
    q = x + y
    r1 = p % 2
    r2 = q % 2
    if a == x and b == y:
        print(0)
    elif r1 == r2:
        print('2')
    else:
        print('1')
    t -= 1
